# Output

Utilities for collecting and serializing manifests.

## Manifest Collection

::: k8smith.output.manifest.Manifest
    options:
      members:
        - add
        - to_yaml
        - to_file
        - to_dicts

## YAML Serialization

::: k8smith.output.yaml.dump

::: k8smith.output.yaml.dump_one

::: k8smith.output.yaml.load
